name: The Tutorial Is Too Tough!
author: 이마에 다이키
content: Lee Hojae had given up his life as a pro gamer, until one day he received a mysterious message: &quotCongratulations! You’ve been invited to the Tutorial World.&quotIntrigued, he enters the game and confidently chooses Hell difficulty, but soon learns that he is trapped there. With a mere 0.01&#37 survival rate, Hojae must somehow overcome the game’s agonizing challenges to figure out the real reason he was invited.This tutorial may be tough, but its secrets are what’s truly hellacious.
